ygData.subject: Re: Test of Truth
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a high elf paladin level 14 on Solusek server and I am wondering, is it possible for me to do this quest to become a knight? Or is the quest only open for
ygData.messageBody:
I am a high elf paladin level 14 on Solusek server and I am wondering, is
it possible for me to do this quest to become a knight? Or is the quest
only open for paladins from freeport and below level 9? If that is the
case they should implement more quests that are open to paladins of other
races and higher levels that can give the same result, adding a Sir to
your name.. It would REALLY stink to find out I missed out on this, since
at lower levels I was not very interrested in questing at all, I did some
quests in my guild but they were very crappy and had puny rewards, like
the Dvinn heart quest, kill a level 25+ npc, get his head and for that you
get a few silver.. :/ A quest like the test of truth with a REAL reward
would really improve my view on quests in EQ..

- Avron -
